title: 您好，运行ernie-vil的时候遇到了问题，想请教一下问题出在哪里
body:
运行 bash run_inference.sh vcr qa test conf/vcr/model_conf_vcr model/vcr_base/vocab.txt model/vcr_base/ernie_vil_config.base.json model/vcr_base/params res 时，会在

逐行检查是在
```
    if args.do_test: 

        predict = predict_wrapper(
            args,
            exe,
            ernie_config,
            task_group,
            test_prog=test_prog,
            pyreader=test_pyreader,
            graph_vars=model_outputs)

        result = predict()
```
断开的，报错类型是
```

W0430 16:08:51.703033 47477 device_context.cc:252] Please NOTE: device: 6, CUDA Capability: 75, Driver API Version: 10.1, Runtime API Version: 10.0
```
